thread.title: Melania is 'heartened' to see students speak out after shooting

title: Melania is 'heartened' to see students speak out after shooting
text:
Melania is 'heartened' to see students speak out after shooting Tuesday, February 27, 2018 - 01:46 
First lady Melania Trump says she is ''heartened'' to see students speak out after the shooting in Parkland, Florida that left 17 students and staff dead. Rough Cut (no reporter narration). ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
First lady Melania Trump says she is "heartened" to see students speak out after the shooting in Parkland, Florida that left 17 students and staff dead. Rough Cut (no reporter narration).
